chicken.name: Teriyaki Chicken
ing: One 2-inch (5cm) piece of fresh ginger, peeled and grated
2-pounds (900g) boneless chicken thighs (4-8 thighs, depending on size)

cheese.name: Three-Cheese Grilled Cheese
ing: 8 slices baguette, cut on the diagonal (each about 1/3 inch thick and 3 inches from end to end)

clementines.name: Clementines in Cinnamon Syrup recipes
ing: 8 clementines, peeled and thinly sliced crosswise

clementines.name: Honey-Preserved Clementines
ing: 1-1/2 lb. firm clementines (5 to 7), cut horizontally into 3/4-inch-thick slices

clementines.name: Duck Tagine With Clementines
ing: 2.0 tsp each ground coriander, cumin, ginger and paprika

chilli.name: Chioggia chilli beetroot chips
ing: Salt and chilli pepper/cayenne, to taste

chilli.name: Vegetarian chilli
ing: 1 level teaspoon cayenne pepper, plus extra for sprinkling
1 heaped teaspoon ground cumin, plus extra for sprinkling
1 level teaspoon ground cinnamon, plus extra for sprinkling
2 x 400 g tinned beans, such as kidney, chickpea, pinto and cannellini

chilli.name: Chilli Paneer
ing: Water to mix the above ingredients

chilli.name: Vegetarian chilli
ing: 1 red and 1 green pepper, stalk and seeds removed, and chopped
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

chocolate.name: Chocolate Mousse
ing: 1 ounce semisweet or bittersweet chocolate, per person

chocolate.name: Iced chocolate
ing: 1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder, preferably dutch-process
8 chocolates or 4 ounces (115g) bittersweet or semisweet chocolate, chopped
2 to 3 scoops chocolate ice cream or chocolate sherbet
Optional: 1 to 2 tablespoons, kahluà or espresso (cooled), or to taste
Lightly sweetened whipped cream and chocolate shavings, for serving

chocolate.name: Serious Chocolate: Easy Chocolate Pie Crust Recipe
ing: 2 cups chocolate wafers or 2 cups chocolate graham crackers

chocolate.name: Chocolate Glaze
ing: 6 ounces best-quality bittersweet chocolate or semisweet chocolate

coconut-milk.name: Coconut Milk Fudge
ing: 2 tablespoons salted or unsalted butter (salted will give the candy more contrast)
1/3 cup finely shredded unsweetened coconut (I lightly toasted mine, for crunch)
1/3 cup chocolate sprinkles or “vermicelli” (see Note below)

coconut-milk.name: Ginger Coconut Milk Soup
ing: 12 ounces good, dried egg pasta noodles (or yuba skins*)
1 14-ounce can water (use the coconut can to measure)
2-inch knob of ginger, peeled and grated (~1T grated)
1 1/2 teaspoons fine grain sea salt, or to taste
2 patty pan squashes, cut into small cubes
a couple handfuls of bite-sized mushrooms
to serve: lots of fresh lime juice, plenty of fresh cilantro

coffee-powder.name: Coffee Crème Brûlée | Crème Brûlée Au Café
ing: 1/4 cup (50g) granulated sugar, plus more for caramelizing
Pinch sea salt or kosher salt
1 tablespoon instant espresso or coffee powder
2 teaspoons Kahlúa or other coffee-flavored liqueur

coffee-powder.name: Coffee Crème Brûlée
ing: 2 tablespoons coarsely ground espresso coffee beans
2 teaspoons instant espresso powder or coffee powder

coffee-powder.name: Irish Coffee Caramel Mousse
ing: 1 tablespoon instant espresso powder or instant coffee powder

couscous.name: Couscous Salad
ing: 2 roasted red peppers (from a jar is fine)

creme-fraiche.name: Roasted Carrots With Creme Fraiche & Za'atar
ing: 1 bunch carrots (I like multi color ones for visual appeal)
coarse sea salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

creme-fraiche.name: Salmon with Wasabi-Creme Fraiche
ing: 2 pounds fillet of wild salmon (i particularly like this with wild sockeye)
1 -2 teaspoon wasabi paste, start with 1 teaspoon and add more to taste)

creme-fraiche.name: Butternut Squash Crostini With Thyme Creme Fraiche
ing: 1 small butternut squash, peeled and cut into 3/4-inch cubes

creme-fraiche.name: Creme Fraiche Quiche
ing: 3/4 lb bacon (12 slices) cut crosswise into 3/4-inch wide pieces
1 sheet frozen puff pastry ( from a 17 1/4-ounce package), thawed

dip.name: Panko-Crusted Spinach Dip
ing: Three 16-ounce bags frozen spinach, defrosted and drained
Two 8-ounce packages cream cheese, at room temperature

dip.name: Sausage Roll Twists With Tomato Dip
ing: 1⁄2 a 500g block all-butter puff pastry , defrosted if frozen

dip.name: Feta Dip
ing: 1/2 cup (140 grams) plain yogurt, preferably full-fat Greek yogurt
1 tablespoon fresh oregano leaves (or substitute parsley, dill, basil, or just about anything in your garden)
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste

dip.name: Baby Spinach Dip Won Ton Cups
ing: ½ cup green onions, chopped, divided
1 package (1.4-ounce) vegetable dip mix (i like knorr)

dip.name: Roasted Red Pepper Dip with Green Herbs
ing: 4-5 roasted red peppers (skin/seeds/stem removed,) if using jarred then quickly rinse off any jar water.
1/4 cup crème fraîche (you can up to a 1/2+ cup, depending on how creamy you want your dip to be)
Kosher salt and black pepper, to taste

eggs.name: Baked Eggs
ing: Vegetable oil or butter, for the muffin tin
6 large eggs (choose eggs of a very similar size)
2 tablespoons chopped, slightly undercooked bacon (figure 2 slices)
Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste

eggs.name: Scrambled Eggs
ing: Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper

falafels.name: Spicy Falafels
ing: 1.0 tsp ground coriander (or use more cumin)
handful parsley , chopped, or 1 tsp dried mixed herbs

falafels.name: Falafel With Black Olives and Harissa Recipe
ing: 3 ounces pitted black olives (about 1/2 cup; 85g), roughly chopped

falafels.name: Homemade falafels with salad and pitta bread
ing: ½ cucumber, peeled and thinly sliced
100g/3½oz tomatoes (approximately two medium tomatoes), roughly chopped

falafels.name: Falafel Salad with Tahini-Lemon Dressing

About 6 cups chopped hearts of romaine
1 small English cucumber, halved lengthwise and sliced

falafels.name: Falafel Crusted Salmon on a Bed of Spinach
ing: 2 wild salmon fillets, about 1 pound each, skin removed
Extra virgin olive oil (to film the pan)
2 additional tablespoons extra virgin olive oil
2 bags (10 ounces each) fresh spinach, stemmed, well washed and dried

fish-sauce.name: Fish Sauce Dressing Recipe
ing: 1 to 3 bird's eye chilies, thinly sliced with seeds intact

fish-sauce.name: Thai Fish Sauce with Hot Chiles
ing: 1/2 cup red thai chiles, stems removed

fish-sauce.name: Vegan Fish Sauce
ing: 6 fat cloves garlic, crushed but not peeled

flour.name: Flour Focaccia from 'Flour, Too'
ing: 1 teaspoon active dry yeast, or 0.2 ounces (5 grams) fresh cake yeast
Small handful of cornmeal for sprinkling on the baking sheet

flour.name: Flour Tortillas With Bacon Fat
ing: 2 cups all-purpose flour, plus more for the work surface

flour.name: Flour Tortillas
ing: 6 tbsp vegetable shortening (preferably a non-hydrogenated type, such as Spectrum)

garlic.name: Garlic Bread
ing: 1 baguette (24 inches long), halved crosswise, then lengthwise

garlic.name: Garlic Soup
ing: 1/2 cup finely grated Parmesan cheese (about 2 ounces)

lemon-grass.name: Lemon Grass rice
ing: 1/2 cup green onion chopped for garnish (optional)

lemon-grass.name: Cook the Book: Sri Lankan Rice with Cilantro and Lemon Grass
ing: 10 fresh curry leaves or 5 fresh basil leaves, torn up
2 cloves garlic, crushed to a pulp
2 teaspoons finely grated peeled fresh ginger
The bottom 6 inches of a lemon grass stalk, cut into 2 pieces
1 packed cup finely chopped cilantro (use tender stems and leaves)
1 teaspoon salt (1 1/2 teaspoons if the stock is unsalted)

lemon-grass.name: Taro Infused with Lemon Grass and Ginger
ing: 1 cup macadamia nuts, toasted and smashed
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

lemon-grass.name: Grilled pork chops with sweet lemon grass marinade
ing: 1 thai chile , stemmed and finely chopped
3 bone-in center-cut pork chops, each about 12 ounces and 1 inch thick

lettuce.name: Lettuce Wraps
ing: 1 pound ground turkey (or your choice of protein)
6 ounces house of tsang bangkok padang peanut sauce

lettuce.name: Peas and Lettuce
ing: 2 lbs. fresh peas, shelled to yield 2 cups
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

lettuce.name: Peas & Lettuce
ing: 2 cups shelled fresh peas, (3 pounds unshelled)
4 cups thinly sliced Boston lettuce, (about 1 small head)

lettuce.name: Pork Lettuce Wraps Recipe
ing: 2 small heads bibb lettuce or 1 head iceberg lettuce

lime.name: Lime Vinegar
ing: 2 cups fresh lime juice, about 1½ to 1¾ pounds limes

lime.name: Lime Rickey
ing: Â½ lime, cut into quarters, plus 1 oz. fresh lime juice

lime.name: Key Lime Daiquiri
ing: 30 grams Key lime juice (1 ounce, about 5 Key limes)
30 grams simple syrup (1 ounce; 1:1 sugar to water by weight)

lime.name: Kaffir Lime Cordial
ing: 8 leaves Kaffir Lime , sliced into ribbons
still or sparkling water and ice, for serving

lime-leaves.name: Dinner Tonight: Pork Patties with Lime Leaves and Cilantro Recipe
ing: 1-3 fresh red chiles, depending on taste

lime-leaves.name: Roast Sea Bass With Chilli & Lime Leaves
ing: 4.0 tsp very finely chopped lemon grass
2 x 675g/1½lb sea bass , descaled and filleted
1 fresh red chilli , deseeded and finely chopped
4.0 tbsp each thai fish sauce and rice wine vinegar
2.0 tbsp each sunflower oil, sesame oil and caster sugar
6 long outside leaves from spring onions or two knotted together, for tying (see 'try' below)
2 fennel bulbs , halved and very thinly sliced

lime-leaves.name: Scallops Wrapped In Kaffir Lime Leaves
ing: 1 medium onion, halved and thinly sliced lengthwise
1/2 cup chicken stock or canned low-sodium broth

lime-leaves.name: Milk-Poached Halibut Flavored with Rosemary and Kaffir Lime Leaves
ing: 4 halibut fillets, each 6 oz. and 1 1/2 inches thick
Olive oil or butter for searing (optional)

lime-leaves.name: Kaffir Lime Cordial
ing: 8 leaves Kaffir Lime , sliced into ribbons
still or sparkling water and ice, for serving

lime-juice.name: Sautéed Corn With Chorizo, Cilantro, and Lime Juice Recipe
ing: 4 ounces Spanish-style dry-cured chorizo, cut into 1/2-inch dice
4 cups fresh corn kernels, cut from 4 to 5 cobs of corn
1/4 cup roughly chopped fresh cilantro leaves and tender stems
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

lime-juice.name: Tomato, Watermelon And Lime Juice Recipe
ing: 2 large wedges ripe watermelon, rinds removed

lime-juice.name: Roasted Butternut Squash with Lime Juice
ing: 1 3 1/2-pound butternut squash, peeled, cut crosswise into 1/2-inch-thick slices
4 teaspoons fresh lime juice plus 1 lime cut into wedges for garnish

lime-juice.name: Mussels with Lime Juice and Mirin recipes
ing: 1/2 cup freshly squeezed lime juice (about 7 limes)
1 lemongrass stalk, sliced diagonally 1/8 inch thick
2 pounds mussels, cleaned and beard removed

lime-juice.name: Jicama Salad with Lime Juice and Fresh Mint recipes
ing: 1 medium jicama (1 1/2-2 pounds), peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
3/4 teaspoon chipotle chile powder (or 1 1/2 teaspoons ancho chile powder)
25 fresh mint leaves, cut into thin strips
2 tablespoons queso añejo (or feta or goat cheese)

marinade.name: Sweet Steak Marinade
ing: Here are the simiple ingredients you'll need for this amazing marinade:

marinade.name: Greek Marinade
ing: 1/2 cup fresh lemon juice (from 3 to 4 lemons)
4 cloves garlic, crushed or finely chopped
1 tablespoon each chopped fresh oregano, rosemary, thyme, and basil

marinade.name: Vegetable Marinade
ing: Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper

marinade.name: Savory Bread Pudding Bites With Sweet Onion Marinade
ing: 2 tablespoons Saucy Mama Sweet Onion Marinade, plus more for serving

marinade.name: Chimichurri Marinade
ing: 3-4 garlic cloves, thinly sliced or minced
1 fresno chile or red jalapeño, finely chopped

mushrooms.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
ing: 2 heaping tablespoons roughly chopped flat-leaf parsley

mushrooms.name: Grilled Mushrooms
ing: 1 lb. oyster mushrooms, cleaned and trimmed

mushrooms.name: Sauteed Mushrooms
ing: Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
1 lb mixed mushrooms, such as chanterelles, cremini, and oyster, wiped clean and sliced

mushrooms.name: Sake Mushrooms
ing: scant 1/2 teaspoon fine grain sea salt

mushrooms.name: Garlic Butter Roasted Mushrooms
ing: 1 pound mushrooms such as cremini or white, halved lengthwise if large
3 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut into pieces

onions.name: Caramelized Onions
ing: 16 medium onions peeled with just the tops trimmed off

onions.name: Pickled Red Onions Recipe
ing: 2 large red onions, finely sliced (about 1 quart)

onions.name: Caramelized Onions
ing: 1 pound vidalia onions, each cut into eights

onions.name: Melted onions
ing: 2 large yellow onions, peeled and sliced into rings

onions.name: Braised Onions
ing: 1 pound pearl onions, about 1 inch in diameter
Chicken stock or water (or vegetable stock for vegetarian option)

oregano.name: Greek Salad With Lemon And Oregano
ing: 1/2 a large, seedless English cucumber (about 6 to 7 ounces), chopped
1 cup (about 6 ounces) cherry or grape tomatoes, halved
1/4 cup kalamata olives (you can also serve these alongside)
2 to 3 ounces feta (Bulgarian or French, if you can find them, are my favorites), in thick slices
2 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

oregano.name: Oregano Marinade recipes
ing: 5 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice (from about 2 medium lemons)
1/4 cup packed fresh oregano (leaves and tender stems only)
1/2 medium yellow onion, peeled and halved again

oregano.name: Lemon-Oregano Leg of Lamb
ing: 1/3 cup lemon-infused olive oil, or plain extra-virgin olive oil
1 tablespoon very finely grated Meyer lemon zest
4 pounds boneless leg of lamb, tied

pepper.name: Dr Pepper Glazed Ham
ing: 1 7- to 10-pound spiral-sliced, bone-in half ham, preferably shank end

pepper.name: Lemon Pepper Chicken
ing: 600 grams chicken leg – bone-in skin-on (2 large legs)

pepper.name: Red Pepper Soup
ing: 12 large red bell peppers, cut into 1-inch pieces
2 cups chicken or vegetable stock or broth
1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon hot red pepper flakes
Salt and white or black pepper

pepper.name: Pepper Gravy Recipe
ing: 1 tablespoon coarsely ground black pepper, plus more to taste

pepper.name: Pepper Tuna
ing: 4 sushi-grade tuna fillets (8 oz/225g each), each cut 6 inches/15 cm long and 2 inches/5 cm thick
½ cup/55g coarsely ground black pepper or crushed black pepper

pomegranate.name: POMEGRANATE SORBET recipes
ing: 4 cups freshly-squeezed pomegranate juice – from 7 large pomegranates

pomegranate.name: Pomegranate Margarita
ing: ½ oz. pomegranate juice, plus more for rimming the glass
Pinch of salt, plus more for rimming the glass3 oz. blanco tequila

prawns.name: Spanish garlic prawns
ing: 2 chillies (hot or mild, to taste), deseeded, chopped
1 tbsp smoked paprika (or if not available, standard paprika)
300g/10½oz bag cooked, frozen peeled prawns, defrosted, (or use raw king prawns, peeled and de-veined)

salmon.name: Salmon Rillettes/Salmon Spread
ing: 8 ounce (250 g) piece of salmon, preferably wild, bones removed
4 ounces (125 g) smoked salmon, cut into thin strips, then cut into ½-inch (2 cm) pieces
¼ teaspoon chili powder or smoke paprika (I use pimente d’Espelette) or a few turns of freshly-ground white pepper

salmon.name: Steamed Salmon
ing: 1 center-cut boneless salmon fillet (4 ounces), skin on

salmon.name: Salmon Rillette
ing: 1 pound salmon fillet, skin and pin bones removed
1 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature, divided

sugar.name: Sugar Puffs
ing: 6 tablespoons (90 grams) unsalted butter, cut into small chunks
1 x large eggs, at room temperature
2 tbsp Glaze: 1 egg yolk whisked with 1 teaspoon milk
Toppings: Pearl sugar and/or miniature chocolate chips

stock.name: Veal Stock And Guinness Bread
ing: 4 ounces/113 grams veal stock (at room temp or better)
8 ounces/227 grams Guinness draught (though Extra Stout might be even better)

stock.name: Turkey Stock
ing: 4 pounds turkey (preferably), goose, or duck parts (such as carcasses, wings, legs and necks)
2 leeks, split lengthwise, washed very well under running water and chopped (be sure to separate the leeks under the water to wash thoroughly.)
Bouquet garni consisting of: 6 sprigs fresh parsley, 6 sprigs fresh thyme, 3 sprigs fresh sage, 1 bay leaf
½ cup melted turkey fat from the roasting turkey (or butter, goose, or duck fat)
Turkey giblets and/or neck (and any other collected duck or goose giblets), chopped
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

stock.name: Stock Under Pressure
ing: 2 small or one large chicken carcass, raw or cooked
1 onion, quatered, skin left on, it adds a nice golden color to the stock
1 leek top, rinsed, lacking that add another onion

stock.name: Ham Stock
ing: 800 gram ham bone cut in half

tomatoes.name: Tomatoes Provençal
ing: 4 medium to largish (about 2 pounds total) ripe heirloom tomatoes, halved crosswise
2 slices day-old bread (about 1-inch thick) store-bought or homemade
1 tablespoon herbes de Provence (a blend of dried herbs typically comprising some blend of thyme, basil, fennel, lavender, savory and/or marjoram)

tomatoes.name: Roasted Tomatoes
ing: 6 cloves garlic, unpeeled and lightly crushed
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste

tomatoes.name: Roasted Cherry Tomatoes
ing: Freshly ground black pepper to taste

tom-yum-paste.name: Trotter Tom Yum Soup Recipe
ing: 1 stalk lemon grass, cut into 2-inch sections and bruised slightly
rice noodles cooked according to instructions on package

tom-yum-paste.name: Tom Yum Goong Soup
ing: 3 stalks lemongrass, green part and root trimmed, remaining section cut into 3 pieces
5 kaffir lime leaves, each torn into 4 pieces
2-inch piece galangal or ginger, sliced crosswise into 6 to 7 pieces
1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, left whole if small and roughly chopped if medium or large
2 tablespoons tamarind paste (you know, the block of brown tamarind found in Asian markets)
3 to 15 bird’s eye chile peppers, smashed, to taste
2 tablespoons nam prik pao (roasted chile paste)
4 to 8 tablespoons fish sauce, or to taste
6 to 12 tablespoons lime juice, or to taste
1/4 cup fresh cilantro leaves for garnish

tom-yum-paste.name: Tom Yum Goong (Hot And Sour Shrimp Soup)
ing: 12 fresh or frozen Kaffir lime leaves
8 oz. medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
4–6 Thai chiles, stemmed and smashed with

tom-yum-paste.name: Tom Yum Soup
ing: 13.5 ounces can coconut milk, whole fat
1 (2-inch) piece galangal root, peeled and grated
5 small dry jalapeno chiles, ground (can sub. 2 tablespoons red pepper flakes)
8 ounces can sliced bamboo shoots, drained
1 packet soba noodles, cooked according to package instructions
1 bunch basil, cilantro, mint, bean sprouts, lime wedges, and green onions, to garnish

tom-yum-paste.name: Tom Yum Goong
ing: 1 pound medium-size shrimp, shell and head on, if possible (see Note)
8 magrut (also known as kaffir) lime leaves, torn into chunks
2-inch piece galangal, thinly sliced into 1/8 -inch rounds (see Note)
1 to 4 Thai chiles cut into 1/4-inch chunks, to taste
1/4 cup + 1 tablespoon Thai chile paste (see Note)
-- Cooked rice or rice noodles, for serving, if desired

vanilla.name: Vanilla Extract
ing: 1 mini bottle liquor such as bourbon, vodka or rum

vanilla.name: Vanilla Milkshake
ing: 3/4 cup (6 ounces) milk, preferably whole, very cold
4 generous scoops (about 1 1/2 cups) vanilla ice cream, very cold

vinegar.name: Beer Vinegar
ing: 1/2 gallon good, wheaty or malty beer

vinegar.name: Chive Blossom Vinegar Recipe
ing: 1 1/2 cups champagne or white wine vinegar
2 1/2 cups chive blossoms, snipped right beneath the head

vinegar.name: Vinegar Reductions
ing: 1/4 cup fig jam, pressed through a sieve

water.name: Water Kefir from 'Mastering Fermentation'
ing: 12 cups nonchlorinated water, at room temperature (see note below)
3/4 cup raw unrefined cane sugar or Sucanat

yoghurt.name: Carrots with garlic yoghurt
ing: 1 tablespoon sherry vinegar or red wine vinegar

yoghurt.name: Yoghurt Marinated Goat Steaks
ing: 2 goat steaks, about 1 inch thick each
Plenty of sea salt and freshly cracked pepper

yoghurt.name: Coconut yoghurt
ing: 2 cans coconut milk or cream (400g/14oz), approx 20% fat

yoghurt.name: Mango and yoghurt ice pops
ing: 1 small can (165ml or 5.5 fl oz) coconut milk
